name: Don't Step on Larry!
description:
Don't Step on Larry!

Play as Larry also known as Fly Boy, the kid that got shrunk and became the hero of the flies!

Help Larry catch Simon, the evil fly as you collect Coins and Power Ups!

3 types of power Ups! 

- Duplicate points!

- Double Jump!

- Grow up!

Use your mouse to simulate the touch screen and swipe around.
